subject: Investors News
body:
Forthcoming ransom of the controlling stock CHINA VOICE HOLDING promises huge profit to the investors.














Thursday, June 7


Forthcoming ransom of the controlling stock CHINA VOICE HOLDING promises huge profit to the investors.


	ALAN R. ELLIOTT Investor's Business Daily agency analyst:
	We recommend to buy shares CHINA VOICE HOLDING (Other OTC: CHVC.PK) with prediction cost $0.97, which means 77% growth potential to current quotations. 
	This growth is based on forthcoming ransom of the controlling stock CHINA VOICE HOLDING (Other OTC: CHVC.PK), appointed on 06.11.2007, by the NVIDIA Corporation (NASDAQ:  NVDA).
Conjectural sum of the purchasing makes up 15 million dollars.
Facts about forthcoming large deals allow small investors to make a huge profit.
Investor's Business Daily continues to follow new tendencies at the market of NASDAQ.
